title: No North East Line service between Buangkok and Punggol stations

updates.text: 17/08, 10.49pm: NEL service has resumed since 10:21pm. Free bus rides & Bridging bus svc have ceased. We are sorry.
No NEL svc btwn Buangkok & Punggol stn due to a train fault. Free bus rides are available at designated bus stops near affected stations
No NEL service between Woodleigh and Punggol Stations due to a train fault.
